column1: Uchi////I came here for happy hour.  I was the first to arrive in my party. I was greeted with a piece of sushi when I walked in. I sat at the bar to wait.  The bartenders were attentive and friendly. The hostesses were so understanding and courteous when I told them my party was going to be more than 15 mins late.  When my party arrived we ordered everything and anything.  I was not disappointed. The food was beautiful and delicious. The ham and egg was awesome
column3: and everything else was so good.  We ordered so much and it was all overwhelmingly good.
